game.name: Soccer Fan - Online Multiplayer Football
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fast-paced, action-packed soccer fun with Soccer Fan - Online Multiplayer! Enjoy dynamic gameplay and intense competition. Perfect for both football fans and casual gamers!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fast-paced, action-packed soccer fun with Soccer Fan - Online Multiplayer! Enjoy dynamic gameplay and intense competition. Perfect for both football fans and casual gamers!
